short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds the old shortcuts to Google Search within the search tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add this extension to Google Chrome and conduct a Google search. You'll notice the old Google Maps link appear in the search tab.
